repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Irving Sonn was a copy writer for several advertising agencies including: Ted Bates & Co.; Ogilvy & Mather; Compton Advertising, Inc.; and Needham, Harper & Steers. The Irving Sonn Papers span the years 1963-1977 and contain general correspondence, clippings, memorabilia, photographs and presentation slides that primarily document the periods of Sonn's employment at Ted Bates & Co. and Needham, Harper & Steers. Also includes recordings of advertising spots and jingles in a variety of formats, including audiotape and cassettes; VHS and Umatic videocassettes; and 16mm film. Clients include: Burger King; Kodak; Kentucky Fried Chicken; and Toyota. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
In addition, original audiovisual materials are closed to patron use. Technical Services staff need to produce use copies before contents can be accessed.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Irving Sonn Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Irving Sonn Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2004.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession 2004-0143 is described in this finding aid.

eventgrp.event: Graduated from New York University; worked as news clerk at the New York Times
Began employment at Cortez F. Enloe, a company specializing in ethical drug advertising
Copy Chief and Vice President, Compton Advertising, Inc. Worked on the Proctor & Gamble; Brown & Williamson; Pertussin; and Sterling Drug accounts
Vice President, Associate Creative Director and Copy Group Head, Ogilvy, Benson & Mather
Named the first New York Creative Director at Needham, Harper & Steers
Left Ted Bates & Co. Founded his own advertising boutique, Irv Sonn Advertising, Inc.
Executive Creative Director, McCann-Erickson, San Francisco

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Irving Sonn Papers Span the years 1963-1977 and contain general correspondence, clippings, memorabilia, photographs and presentation slides that primarily document the periods of Sonn's employment at Ted Bates & Co. and Needham, Harper & Steers. Also includes recordings of advertising spots and jingles in a variety of formats, including audiotape and cassettes; VHS and Umatic videocassettes; and 16mm film. Clients include Burger King; Kodak; Kentucky Fried Chicken; and Toyota.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into four series: General Files, Slides, Audiovisual Materials and Plaques and Trophies. The General Files series contains correspondence, presentation scripts, clippings, awards ceremony programs and photographs primarily related to Sonn's employment at Ted Bates & Co. The Slides series contains slides used in print advertising campaigns of Ted Bates clients. Also includes slides for speeches and general market presentations, such as toiletries, household products, and food. The Audiovisual Materials series contains audio and videotapes of advertising spots, out takes, songs and jingles related to Ted Bates & Co. clients. The Plaques and Trophies series contains award plaques and trophies won by the Needham, Harper & Steers agency.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Materials related to this collection may be found in the following Hartman Center collections:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Series contains correspondence, presentation scripts, clippings and photographs primarily related to Sonn's employment at Ted Bates & Co. Also includes awards won by Sonn.

did.unittitle: Advertising Writers Association of New York Award, 1963
Correspondence and a meeting schedule, 1977 and undated
Diaper Wonder Book, slide show script, undated
Ted Bates & Company, company information booklet, undated
Ted Bates Unique Selling Proposition, A Disciplined Philosophy of Advertising that Maximizes Sales Effectiveness, undated

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Series contains slides used in print advertising campaigns of various Ted Bates clients. Also includes slides for speeches and general market presentations, such as toiletries, household and drugs. Clients represented include Amtrak, Chevy, Burger King, Colgate, Datsun, Hertz, Hills Bros., J.C. Penney, Kentucky Fried Chicken, Kodak, Kool, Listerine, Maybelline, McDonald's, Ortho, Panasonic, Pizza Hut, Prudential, Sheraton, Singer, Toyota, and the U.S. Navy, among others. Many of the times came organized in wonder books of slides devoted to particular clients or topics.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Includes Flair, Ital Line, Jordan, Bufferin, Calgon, Chase Manhattan, Crazy Canadian, Davies County, Facelle, Manhattan Shirts, Matsushita Electric, Mars Corp., Industrial National Bank, Nair, NY Clearing House, Ocean Spray, RCA, Roses Lime Juice, Schmidts, Schweppes, Upjohn, Warner Lambert, Expeed, Xerox, and Yardley.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains audio and moving image resources, including dvertising spots, out takes, songs and jingles related to Ted Bates & Co. clients. Formats include open reel audio tapes, audiocassettes, videocassettes, and 16mm film.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Analog audiovisual materials require digitization prior to playback. Please contact Research Services for further information.
